sentences.sContent: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.sCn: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

synos.tran: 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

words.tran: 牵连；包含；混乱；财政困难
涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于
trans.tranOther: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it
